The great adversary of souls is seeking to bring a dead, lifeless spiritual atmosphere into all our institutions. 
                                                                           374
He works to turn and twist every circumstance to his own advantage, to the exclusion of Jesus Christ. Today, as in the days of Christ, God cannot do many mighty works because of the unbelief of those who stand in responsible positions. The converting power of God is needed before they will understand the word of God, and be willing to humble themselves before Him as learners.
